But I don't get it, why replace the installation StarTopia.exe with the one provided? The installation one works fine. =\

This is a silly little game that really didn't get that much attention when it came out but for some reason I really enjoyed it. Something about the little aliens and the gardening was really entertaining. I feel the need to download it again and lose a few more hours in this funny little world. I hope I can find someone to play online with this time.
Thanks for the upload!

Great game! shame it's so short + easy tho...not bein big headed but it really is that easy! spose its meant 4 playin online mostly tho? which by the way couldnt find any online games. cheers 4 the upload tho well worth the download!!

I just downloaded and I've run the install and everything works.  no problems.  I used magicdisc to mount the iso.

http://www.magiciso.com/tutorials/miso-magicdisc-history.htm

also, this runs on bootcamp windows xp on my mac, for those interested.
Plays a lot like Dungeon Keeper which is awesome. If you like Dungeon Keeper you'll love this.
